FROM MISS VIOLET RAY, IN PARIS, TO MISS AGNES RICH, IN NEW YORK.

October 25th.

We have been here three weeks, and I am glad to say that we have
settled down into a very pleasant life.  I am glad to say, too, that we
have not been troubled with any of those disagreeable Americans who
seemed to be so numerous when we first arrived.
